empathetic_dialogues: customer: yeah. i didn't want to seem like a whiny brat, but i didn't want to seem like a pushover either, especially when i thought it was stupid to fight about it to begin with. if i lose my job, it won't be the worst thing, since it's just a part-time job to get me through college. but i still hate the feeling that i let people down, or that i look dumb in other people's eyes. agent:
labels: if they know you, they should know better.
